characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: CHARACTERS in a NURGLE Chaos Daemons detachment have the following ability:Each time you make a wound roll of 6+ for a NURGLE DAEMON unit within 6" of any friendly model with the Locus of Virulence, that attack inflicts 1 additional damage.

characteristics.name: Abilities
characteristics.value: You can re-roll failed wound rolls for this weapon.

characteristics.name: Abilities
characteristics.value: Each time a model attended by Nurglings fights, it can make D6 additional attacks with this weapon. You can re-roll wound rolls of 1 for these attacks.

characteristics.name: Details
characteristics.value: Smite has a warp charge value of 5. If manifested, the closest visible enemy unit within 18" of the psyker suffers D3 mortal wounds (pg 181). If the result of the Psychic test was more than 10 the target suffers D6 mortal wounds instead.

characteristics.name: Abilities
characteristics.value: Each time a model attended by Nurglings fights, it can make D6 additional attacks with this weapon. You can re-roll wound rolls of 1 for these attacks.

characteristics.name: Abilities
characteristics.value: This weapon can be fired within 1" of an enemy unit, and can target enemy units within 1" of friendly units. Excess damage from this weapon is not lost; instead keep allocating damage to another model in the target unit until either all the damage has been allocated or the unit has been destroyed.

characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: If a Great Unclean One with a doomsday bell attempts to summon a unit of NURGLE DAEMONS to the battlefield using a Daemonic Ritual you can roll 4 dice instead of 3 for this summoning roll. In addition, at the start of each of your turns, you may roll a D6 for each NURGLE DAEMON unit within 7" of any friendly Great Unclean Ones with a doomsday bell; on a 4+ a single slain model is returned to that unit.

characteristics.name: Details
characteristics.value: If manifested, select a friendly NURGLE DAEMON unit within 18" of the psyker. One model in that unit regains D3 wounds lost wounds.

characteristics.name: Details
characteristics.value: If manifested, the closest enemy unit within 7" if the psyker and visible to it suffers D3 mortal wounds if it has fewer than 10 models, or D6 mortal wounds if it has 10 models or more.

characteristics.value: You can re-roll failed wound rolls for this weapon.

characteristics.name: Details
characteristics.value: If manifested, select a friendly NURGLE DAEMON unit within 18" of the psyker. Add 1 to wound rolls made by that unit in the Fight phase. Furthermore, wound rolls of 7+ made for that unit in the Fight phase inflict double damage.

characteristics.name: Abilities
characteristics.value: You can re-roll failed wound rolls for this weapon.

characteristics.value: Smite has a warp charge value of 5. If manifested, the closest visible enemy unit within 18" of the psyker suffers D3 mortal wounds (pg 181). If the result of the Psychic test was more than 10 the target suffers D6 mortal wounds instead.

characteristics.name: Details
characteristics.value: If manifested, select a friendly NURGLE DAEMON unit within 18" of the psyker. Until the start of your next Psychic phase, your opponent must select 1 from all hit rolls that target that unit.

characteristics.name: Abilities
characteristics.value: You can re-roll wound rolls of 1 made for this weapon.

characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: If you roll a 1 when taking a Morale test for a unit with any Daemonic Icons, reality blinks and the daemonic horde is bolstered. No models flee and D6 slain Plaguebearers are instead added to the unit.

characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: A unit that includes any Instruments of Chaos adds 1 to their Advance and charge rolls.

$.name: Abilities
$.value: After a model riding a Rot Fly makes its close combat attacks you can attack with its mount. Make 4 additional attacks using this weapon profile. You can re-roll failed wound rolls for these attacks.

characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: If you roll a 1 when taking a Morale test for a unit with any Daemonic Icons, reality blinks and the daemonic horde is bolstered. No models flee and 1 slain Plague Drone is instead added to the unit.

characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: A unit that includes any Instruments of Chaos adds 1 to their Advance and charge rolls.

characteristics.name: Abilities
characteristics.value: Against INFANTRY targets, failed wound rolls for this weapon are re-rolled.

characteristics.name: Abilities
characteristics.value: This weapon automatically hits its target.

characteristics.name: Abilities
characteristics.value: You can re-roll failed hit rolls for this weapon.

characteristics.name: Abilities
characteristics.value: After a model accompanied by Nurglings makes its close combat attacks, you can attack with the Nurglings. Make D6 additional attacks, using this weapon profile. You can re-roll wound rolls of 1 for these attacks.

characteristics.name: Details
characteristics.value: Smite has a warp charge value of 5. If manifested, the closest visible enemy unit within 18" of the psyker suffers D3 mortal wounds (pg 181). If the result of the Psychic test was more than 10 the target suffers D6 mortal wounds instead.

characteristics.name: Details
characteristics.value: If manifested, select a friendly NURGLE DAEMON unit within 18" of the psyker. Add 1 to wound rolls made by that unit in the Fight phase. Furthermore, wound rolls of 7+ made for that unit in the Fight phase inflict double damage.

characteristics.name: Details
characteristics.value: If manifested, select a friendly NURGLE DAEMON unit within 18" of the psyker. Until the start of your next Psychic phase, your opponent must select 1 from all hit rolls that target that unit.

characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: Roll a dice each time your Warlord loses a wound in the Fight phase. On a 4+ the unit that inflicted that wound is splashed by acidic ichor and suffers a mortal wound after all of its own attacks have been resolved.

characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: Each Feculent Gnarlmaw in this unit must be set up within 6" of each other, and none can be set up within 1" of any terrain feature.

characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: After it is set up, a Feculent Gnarlmaw is treated as a terrain feature. It cannot move for any reason, is not treated as a friendly or enemy model, and cannot be targeted or affected by any attacks or abilities.

characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: All NURGLE DAEMON units - except VEHICLES and MONSTERS - that are completely within 7" of any Feculent Gnarlmaws receive the benefit of cover, but you add 2 to their saving throws instead of 1 (remember invulnerable saves are not benefitted by cover).

characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: At the start of your turn, roll a D6 for every unit that is within 3" of any Feculent Gnarlmaws; on a 4+, that unit suffers 1 mortal wound, but on a 6 it suffers D3 mortal wounds instead. NURGLE units are unaffected by this ability.

characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: NURGLE DAEMON units that are within 7" of any Feculent Gnarlmaws at the start of their turn can shoot and/or charge this turn, even if they Fell Back or Advanced.

characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: You can re-roll any of the dice used in the summoning roll when a CHAOS CHARACTER from your army that is within 7" of any Feculent Gnarlmaw attempts to summon a unit of NURGLE DAEMONS to the battlefield using a Daemonic Ritual.

characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: CHARACTERS in a NURGLE Chaos Daemons detachment have the following ability:Each time you make a wound roll of 6+ for a NURGLE DAEMON unit within 6" of any friendly model with the Locus of Virulence, that attack inflicts 1 additional damage.

characteristics.name: Abilities
characteristics.value: You can re-roll all failed wound rols for this weapon.

characteristics.name: Abilities
characteristics.value: After Horticulous Slimux makes his close combat attacks, you can attack with Mulch. Make 1 additional attack, using this weapon profile.
